item.title: Personal Comfort Modelling in Student Accomodation
item.description: To test ComCon smart monitor system and build personal comfort model in 10 rooms in Holyrood Student Accomodation.

item.title: ComCon - distributed monitor system
item.description: The sensor system could easily measure air temperature, relative humidity, radient temprature, air velocity, co2, VoC, PM2.5, Illuminance etc. academic level accuracy and low cost. The sensor rules by ISO 7730 and could be used in Indoor Air Quality test.

item.title: Digital app in care home in Edinburgh, UK
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: low cost Directional Hot wire anemometer
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.
